channel.title: CVE Feed for World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-4070|2024-08-04T07:52:20.971Z -- world%20wide%20web%20consortium%20%28w3c%29 -- css%20validator
item.description: In CSS Validator less than or equal to commit 54d68a1, there is a cross-site scripting vulnerability in handling URIs. A user would have to click on a specifically crafted validator link to trigger it. This has been patched in commit e5c09a9.
